title: Global stocks gain as Mexico tariffs averted, yuan falls to 2019 lows
text: U.S. stock futures and Asian shares rose on Monday after the United States dropped its threat to impose tariffs on Mexico in a deal to combat illegal migration from Central America, and as  weak U.S. jobs data raised hopes for U.S.

title: White House seeks delay on Huawei ban for contractors
text: The White House Office of Management and Budget has asked the U.S. Congress for more time to phase in a ban on federal contracts with companies that do business with Chinese telecom giant Huawei, part of a defense law passed last year.

title: Oil prices rise on likelihood of ongoing OPEC+ supply cuts
text: Oil prices rose on Monday after Saudi Arabia said producer club OPEC and Russia were likely to keep withholding supplies, and in relief that the United States and Mexico averted a trade war that would have damaged the global economy.

title: U.S. stock futures, Mexico peso gain on U.S.-Mexico deal
text: U.S. stock futures jumped on Monday after a migration deal between the United States and Mexico late last week to avert a tariff war added to a weak U.S. job data which cemented expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts.

title: Exclusive: Some big tech firms cut employees' access to Huawei, muddying 5G rollout
text: Some of the world's biggest tech companies have told their employees to stop talking about technology and technical standards with counterparts at Huawei Technologies Co Ltd in response to the recent U.S. blacklisting of the Chinese tech firm, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Asia markets trade higher as Trump stands down on Mexico tariff threat
text: Shares in Japan and South Korea traded higher in the morning.

title: Dow futures jump more than 100 points after US-Mexico reach deal to avoid tariffs
text: Trump announced on Friday that he would not impose 5% tariffs on Mexican exports, after Mexico agreed to strengthen immigration enforcement.

title: Dow Jones Futures: Bullish Mexico, China Trade News Good News For Stock Market Rally
text: Stock futures: Will a Mexico tariffs deal, China trade talks fuel the market rally? Apple, Microsoft, AMD were winners last week.

title: Trump acting budget chief asks for delay on Huawei restrictions
text: The Trump administration's acting budget chief is asking for a delay in restrictions against Huawei Technologies Co Ltd products, according to a letter to Vice President Mike Pence and nine members of Congress.

title: BioXcel Pharmaceuticals CEO On Drug Pipeline, How AI Is Changing Sector

title: The Week In Cannabis: Gillibrand's Legalization Plan, Analyst Ratings, South Africa's CBD Store, And Some Legal News
text: In another big week for cannabis, a committee of the Delaware House of Representatives passed a bill to legalize recreational marijuana; Democratic presidential candidate Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand unveiled a cannabis legalization plan that includes expungement and social equity measures; and South Africa got its first CBD store. New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo said he doesn’t think there are enough votes in the state Senate to push recreational cannabis legalization forward.

title: Public Cannabis Companies Target California
text: When California legalized, there were very few options for investors in publicly-traded companies to participate. Today, this has become on of the most important areas of focus for multi-state operators, and the number of choices has expanded dramatically.

title: China may restrict tech access in spiraling trade war with US

title: Canadian oil pipeline congestion sets up lucrative storage play
